name: Circuitus
description: Circuitus is an oscilloscope-themed robot and a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its vibrant orange box, it stands out among its peers. Circuitus is equipped with sturdy soldier arms and legs, allowing it to navigate various terrains with ease. Its distinct feature is the red and black screen, which serves as its window to the digital world. As a diligent robot, Circuitus has honed its abilities to perfection and possesses impressive characteristics.
